about_the_game:
Step into a world of magic and adventure with the Kingdom, Dungeon, and Hero: Original Soundtrack. Composed exclusively for the fantasy game, this soundtrack transports you to a time of legendary heroes, horrific creatures, and epic battles.

Immerse yourself in the enchanting melodies that bring the game's vibrant landscapes and intricate storylines to life. From the hauntingly beautiful orchestral scores of ancient forests to the powerful battle anthems of grand kingdoms, each track is crafted to evoke the rich, immersive atmosphere of the medieval fantasy realm.
